ModMetaData.name: RimTalk: Persona Director
ModMetaData.author: Rabirinth
ModMetaData.description:
This is an add-on for RimTalk.
Features: 1. **Deep Data Extraction**: Reads Genes (Endo/Xeno),Skills, Relationships, and more. 2. **Director Mode**: Generate 3 distinct personality options based on rich data. 3. **Custom Context**: Add your own "Director Notes" to shape the character's memory. 4. **Fully Configurable**: Toggle every data field to save tokens or reduce noise.
